The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 50,232.23 crore. The company management includes Anand G Mahindra - Chairman, Vineet Nayyar - Executive Vice Chairman, C P Gurnani - Managing Director, Anupam Puri - Director, Bharat N Doshi - Director, M Damodaran - Director, M Rajyalakshmi Rao - Director, Ravindra Kulkarni - Director, T N Manoharan - Director, Ulhas N Yargop - Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532755 and the NSE with an NSE Code of TECHM. Its Registered office is at Gateway Building, Apollo Bunder, Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400001. Their Registrars are Link Intime India Pvt. Ltd.}
